page.title: 05THE SUGAR BEET FACTORY
page.content: The sugar beet factory is between Admaston and Allscott.It processes sugar beet brought in by farmers in the surrounding area.This is an important factory as the next nearest sugar beet factory is in Kiddiminster (about 35 miles away).This factory works at full capacity in the months from October to January , the rest of the year utilises the beet collected in these months. Although the sugar beet factory is the tallest building in this area, we were not allowed to go up the towers to take any photographs, because of the security arrangements of the firm.
